dcterms:creator: Z. Xu
A. Petropulu
S. Sun
dcterms:description: A dataset used for the joint design of MIMO-OFDM dual-function radar communication systems, focusing on subcarrier sharing and private subcarriers to enhance communication rates and sensing performance.
dcterms:title: SS-DFRC (Subcarrier Sharing - Dual Function Radar Communication)

dcterms:creator: Z. Xu
A. Petropulu
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores a wideband dual function radar communication system utilizing sparse arrays and OFDM waveforms, focusing on the trade-offs between communication rate and sensing performance.
dcterms:title: Private Subcarriers

dcterms:creator: J. Wang
S. Jia
J. Song
dcterms:description: A dataset related to sparse signal recovery methods used in generalized spatial modulation systems with multiple active transmit antennas.
dcterms:title: SSR (Sparse Signal Recovery)

dcterms:creator: S. Coleri
M. Ergen
A. Puri
A. Bahai
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides various channel estimation techniques based on pilot arrangements in OFDM systems, which are crucial for effective communication.
dcterms:title: Channel Estimation Techniques

dcterms:creator: M. Grant
S. Boyd
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides software for disciplined convex programming, which can be utilized in various optimization problems related to radar and communication systems.
dcterms:title: CVX (Convex Programming Software)
